title: Wrestler sustains fractured neck after botched suicide dive during show

Footage has emerged showing a Mexican wrestler sustaining serious injuries after he suffered a horror fall from the ring during a recent show.

Jesus Alfonso Huerta Escoboza, 53, fractured his neck after attempting to tackle an opponent, before his head crashed into barriers outside of the ring.

The Mexican AAA Worldwide wrestler was competing on a show that was being held at the 67th Anniversary of the Monterrey Coliseum in Mexico City.

In the clip, Huerta, who competes under the stage name of 'La Parka', can be seen launching himself from inside the ring to out of it in a bid to tackle a rival.

However, as the 53-year-old went to complete the move, it is believed his feet became tangled in the ropes and so the wrestler missed his intended target.

Instead, Huerta was instead put on to a collision course with a protective barrier that separated the competitors from the watching crowd.

The impact caused him to lose consciousness, with medical staff immediately tending to the stricken wrestler inside the venue before he was later transferred to the nearby Hospital Oca.

There, Huerta remained overnight as staff at the hospital patiently waited for swelling around the wrestler's head to subside before beginning their examinations.

Mexican newspaper La Reforma reported that the 53-year-old was unable to move his arms or talk following the accident.

Sources close to Huerta said that his health was 'out of danger', but that fractured his neck and cervical vertebrae with the wrestler slowly regaining control of his extremities.

AAA Worldwide Wrestling are a Mexican wrestling promotion based in the country's capital city and regularly put on shows.

The promotion is best known for featuring larger-than-life characters that take part in matches that capture the imagination of the paying crowds that are in attendance.
description: Jesus Alfonso Huerta Escoboza, known as 'La Parka', was seriously hurt after taking part in a match in Mexico City
